document.forum_title: Latest Europe News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: Couple are tied up, pistol-whipped during home invasion; 4 assailants at large
document.topic_text: Couple are tied up, pistol-whipped during home invasion; 4 assailants at large Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 2 hours ago ) Four masked assailants broke into a Sun Valley home, tied up a couple and one of their parents, and beat them before stealing money and jewelry, authorities said. The couple heard a noise about 4:10 a.m. in the backyard of their home in the 8700 block of Bradley Avenue, according to Los Angeles...
